name: Allison & The Cool New Spaceship Body
name_original: Allison & The Cool New Spaceship Body
description:
You play as Allison, a 10-year-old cyborg girl with a person-size spaceship for a body. You learn about terraforming, friendship, animal uplift, bullying, artificial intelligence, and being yourself.

Check out my videos from the POV of a dog in the same setting:

Art: Samuel Pipes
https://www.deviantart.com/spipes
